The subdirectory `workflows` contains YAML for instructing GitHub how
to build and publish the HTML rendering of the Jupyter Book upon push
to master. It's all basic GitHub Actions crud. 

If things are not going
well during your deploy, consider Enabling debug logging for GitHub Actions:

https://docs.github.com/en/actions/configuring-and-managing-workflows/managing-a-workflow-run#enabling-debug-logging
